remarks: If two atoms are comparable, they are equal.  ( ~ atsseq analog.)  TODO: can ~ lspsncmp shorten this?  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
lsatcmp.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatcmp.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatcmp.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. A ) $.
lsatcmp.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
lsatcmp $p |- ( ph -> ( T C_ U <-> T = U ) ) $.
